H2.text: who built the first temple for god in jerusalem. Moses

H3.text: who built the first temple for god in jerusalem. Solomon

A4.text: Solomon is described as undertaking the construction of the temple, with the help of an architect, also named Hiram, and other materials, sent from King Hiram of Tyre.

A5.text: King Solomon is a central biblical figure, who, according to the Hebrew Bible, was the builder of the First Temple in Jerusalem.
